channel.title: Ok help me fixing this major bug now! ! help!
channel.description:
it gives this like on one of the 5 people that are trying to log on, but mostly this happens if people login , log out and than they can't login anymore than it says this ''error connecting to server'' try using a different world '' :eek: :eek: :( :(
than it gives this error in my runserver where i start my server with. and i can't figure out what to do anymore. tried to fix really alot. but nothing works help me!!!

^^ that is only from one person now :eek: it does that to like 5 from the 25 players, its getting anoying with all the pm's and bad attitudes from the players now that i need to fix it . but i can't i need good help! help!
~Pk Heaven Owner~
